title: (Mon Early Bird) Brett Eldredge on Meaning Behind his New Song  and Never ‘Being in Love’ + Lunchbox The Expert Answers Our Tax Questions + Bobby’s Rules When to Text or Call
itunes:title: (Mon Early Bird) Brett Eldredge on Meaning Behind his New Song  and Never ‘Being in Love’ + Lunchbox The Expert Answers Our Tax Questions + Bobby’s Rules When to Text or Call
description:
Brett Eldredge stops by to talk about his new song “Songs About You” and how he’s never been in love. Bobby lets Abby ask her awkward questions to him. Lunchbox claims to be an expert on getting money back on his taxes so we each ask him our questions on what to do. Bobby sets the definite rules on what time it’s acceptable to call or text someone in the morning and at night. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
